Verses: 1 dhevan Yaakkobai Nokki: Nee Ezhundhu Beththelukkup Poi, Ange Kudiyirundhu, Nee Un Sagodharanaagiya Esaavin Mugaththirku Vilagi Odippogirapodhu, Unakkuth Tharisanamaana Dhevanukku Ange Oru Balipeedaththai Undaakku Endraar.

2 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Than Veettaaraiyum Thannodekooda Irundha Matra Anaivaraiyum Nokki: Ungalidaththil Irukkira Anniya Theyvangalai Vilakkippottu, Ungalaich Suththampannikkondu, Ungal Vasthirangalai Maatrungal.

3 naam Ezhundhu Beththelukkup Povom Vaarungal; Enakku Aabaththu Neritta Naalil En Vinnappaththukku Uththaravu Arulichcheydhu, Naan Nadandha Vazhiyile Ennodekooda Irundha Dhevanukku Ange Oru Palibeedaththai Undaakkuven Endraan.

4 appozhudhu Avargal Thangal Kaiyilirundha Ellaa Anniya Theyvangalaiyum, Thangal Kaadhanigalaiyum Yaakkopidaththil Koduththaargal; Yaakkobu Avaigalaich Seekem Oor Aruge Irundha Oru Karvaali Maraththin Keezhe Pudhaiththuppottaan.
5 pinbu Pirayaanam Purappattaargal; Avargalaich Sutrilum Irundha Pattanaththaarukkuth Dhevanaale Payankaram Undaanadhinaal, Avargal Yaakkobin Kumaararaip Pindhodaraadhirundhaargal.
6 yaakkobum Avanodekooda Irundha Ellaa Janangalum Kaanaan Dhesaththilulla Beththel Ennum Loosukku Vandhaargal.
7 ange Avan Oru Palibeedaththaik Katti, Than Sagodharanudaiya Mugaththukkuth Thappi Odinapodhu, Ange Thanakku Dhevan Tharisanamaanapadiyaal, Andha Sthalaththirku Elbeththel Endru Perittaan.
8 rebekkaalin Thaadhiyaagiya Theporaal Mariththu, Beththelukkuch Sameebamaayirundha Oru Karvaali Maraththinkeezh Adakgampannappattaal; Adharku Allonpaakoodh Ennum Per Undaayitru.
9 yaakkobu Padhaan Araamilirundhu Vandhapinbu Dhevan Avanukku Marupadiyum Tharisanamaagi, Avanai Aaseervadhiththu:
10 ippozhudhu Un Per Yaakkobu, Ini Un Per Yaakkobu Ennappataamal, Isravel Endru Unakkup Per Vazhangum Endru Solli, Avanukku Isravel Endru Perittaar.

11 pinnum Dhevan Avanai Nokki: Naan Sarvavallamaiyulla Dhevan, Nee Palugip Perukuvaayaaga; Oru Jaadhiyum Parpala Jaadhigalin Koottangalum Unnidaththilirundhu Undaakum; Raajaakkalum Un Sandhadhiyil Pirappaargal.
12  Naan Aabiragaamukkum Eesaakkukkum Koduththa Dhesaththai Unakkuk Koduppen; Unakkuppin Un Sandhadhikkum Indha Dhesaththaik Koduppen Endru Solli,
13 dhevan Avanode Pesina Sthalaththilirundhu Avanaivittu Ezhundharulip Ponaar.
14 appozhudhu Yaakkobu Thannode Avar Pesina Sthalaththile Oru Katroonai Niruththi, Adhinmel Paanabaliyai Ootri, Enneyaiyum Vaarththaan.
15 dhevan Thannode Pesina Andha Sthalaththirku Yaakkobu Beththel Endru Perittaan.
16 pinbu, Beththelai Vittup Pirayaanam Purappattaargal. Eppiraaththaavukku Vara Innum Konjam Thooramirukkumpodhu, Raagel Pillai Petraal; Pirasavaththil Avalukkuk Katumvedhanai Undaayitru.
17  Pirasavikkumpodhu, Avalukkuk Katumvedhanaiyaayirukkaiyil, Maruththuvachchi Avalaip Paarththu: Payappadaadhe, Indha Muraiyum Puththiranaip Peruvaai Endraal.
18 maranakaalaththil Aval Aaththumaa Piriyumpodhu, Aval Avanukku Benoni Endru Perittaal; Avan Thagappano, Avanukku Benyameen Endru Perittaan.
19 raagel Mariththu, Bethlagem Ennum Eppiraaththaa Oorukkup Pogira Vazhiyile Adakgampannappattaal.
20 aval Kallaraiyinmel Yaakkobu Oru Thoonai Niruththinaan; Adhuve Innaalvaraikkum Irukkira Raageludaiya Kallaraiyin Thoon.
21  Isravel Pirayaanampanni, Edher Engira Kopuraththirku Appuraththil Koodaaram Pottaan.
22 isravel Andhath Dhesaththil Thangik Kutiyirukkumpodhu, Rooban Poi, Than Thagappanudaiya Marumanaiyaattiyaagiya Pilgaalode Sayaniththaan; Adhai Isravel Kelvippattaan.
23 yaakkobin Kumaarar Panniranduper. Yaakkobin Mooththamaganaagiya Rooban, Simiyon, Levi, Yoodhaa, Isakkaar, Sepulon Enbavargal Leyaal Petra Kumaarar.
24  Yoseppu, Benyameen Enbavargal Raagel Petra Kumaarar.
25 thaan, Napthali Enbavargal Raageludaiya Panividaikkaariyaagiya Pilgaal Petra Kumaarar.
26 gaath, Aaser Enbavargal Leyaalin Panividaikkaariyaagiya Silpaal Petra Kumaarar; Ivargale Yaakkobukkup Padhaan Araamile Pirandha Kumaarar.
27 pinbu, Yaakkobu Arpaavin Ooraagiya Mamrekku Than Thagappanaagiya Eesaakkinidaththil Vandhaan; Adhu Aabiragaamum Eesaakkum Thangiyirundha Ebiron Ennum Oor.
28 eesaakku Viruththaappiyamum Poorana Aayusumullavanaagi, Nootrenpadhu Varusham Jeeviththirundhu,
29 piraananpoi Mariththu, Than Janaththaarode Serkgappattaan. Avan Kumaararaagiya Esaavum Yaakkobum Avanai Adakgampanninaargal.
